name: Mother (itch)
description:
SCHIZOID BAND presents:

ANDROID SKETCHES

SIDE B track 2

Album INITIATION

2014

Mother is a game about tension and immersion. You are an astronaut with a single goal: to return home.

It is my second participation in ludum dare.

I used images of the Rorschach test to create the base of backgrounds patterns design with 3 colors.

The mechanic used the keyboard keys in the total of only 3 minutes of gameplay.

{ post-ludum dare 28 experience }

_

schizoid band

game by andre teruya eichemberg

sound design by sabrina maia

Time of development: 1 week
